name: UE4 - Enhanced Movement Training Course
description:
This game was developed by myself as an entry for ScoreSpace Jam #19.
The theme was Parkour with a time trial optional mechanic.
With that in mind I've put together a set of familiar but fun free movement/parkour style mechanics in a first person game and set up a sort of Training Course like you would see as a tutorial in a larger game.

Originally the project was to contain a full fledged high scores table, but development time ran short and I defaulted to timing the player and storing a local best time so you can try and improve on your time through the course.

Controls are implemented for keyboard+mouse as well as standard x-box style gamepads, there are hint nodes in game with specifics.

To complete this project I used a couple assets off the UE Marketplace, namely for sound and for level geometry, they are as follows:
SuperGrid Starter Pack by ZeOrb
Footsteps Sounds by Bartosz Kamol Kaminski
